name: TestScript Example General Observation
description: TestScript example resource with setup to delete if present and create a new instance of a Observation; and single test definition to read the created Observation with various asserts.
purpose: Observation Conditional Create (Update), Read and Delete Operations

link.description: Measurements and simple assertions made about a Observation, device or other subject.

capability.description: Observation Update, Read and Delete Operations

operation.label: SetupDeleteObservation
operation.description: Execute a delete operation to ensure the observation does not exist on the server.

assert.description: Confirm that the returned HTTP status is 200(OK) or 204(No Content).

operation.label: SetupCreateObservation
operation.description: Create observation resource on test server using the contents of fixture-observation-create

assert.description: Confirm that the returned HTTP status is 201(Created).

operation.description: Read the created observation resource on the test server using the id from fixture-Observation-create. Verify contents.

assert.description: Confirm that the returned HTTP status is 200(OK).
Confirm that the returned Observation contains the expected value: 6.3.

test.name: Read Observation
test.description: Read a Observation and validate response.

operation.description: Read the Observation resource on the test server using the id from fixture-observation-create. Prevent URL encoding of the request.

assert.label: 01-ReadObservationOK
assert.description: Confirm that the returned HTTP status is 200(OK).
Confirm that the returned HTTP Header Last-Modified is present. Warning only as the server might not support versioning.
Confirm that the returned resource type is Observation.
Confirm that the returned Observation conforms to the base FHIR specification.
Confirm that the returned Observation contains the expected value.
Confirm that the returned resource contains the expected retained elements and values. Warning only to provide users with reviewable results.

operation.description: Delete the Observation resource on the test server using the id from fixture-Observation-create.
